p: Prevention of the cytokine storm may be one of the solution to save the patients with severe COVID-19 pneumonia. Limited pre-clinical data suggested that systemic mesenchymal stem cells (MSCs) administration could cure or significantly improved the functional outcomes in seven SARS-CoV2 patients without any adverse effect [ 92]. Addition of anticytokinic biological agents, like anti-IL-1 (anakinra) [ 93] or anti-IL-6 (tocilizumab (TCZ)) [ 94] are also recommended.
